LanguageData.TrollScenario.label: Trolls - The New Tribe
LanguageData.TrollScenario.description: Darkspear Island has been ravaged by murlocs and their naga sea-witch goddess. Many of your tribe joined the orcs in their travels, but you decided to find your own path. Packing only what you deemed necessary the three of you have claimed territory in an unexplored part of the world.
